ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.DESC1: Hello! I'm Miqueas, I'm 20 years old and I'm from La Plata, Buenos Aires, I started programming in 2020 (Plena Pandemia) with processing, then pascal (on paper), and in addition to this I was learning new technologies in a self-taught way, I'm passionate about the IT world and programming.
ABOUT.DESC2: I like order and aesthetics, I try to replicate those tastes in the creation of attractive, friendly and accessible user interfaces (a11y).
ABOUT.DESC3: I try every day to pursue excellence in every project or job I have, as I believe that the perfect product/development does not exist, there is always room for improvement.
ABOUT.DESC4: I consider myself a calm, respectful, honest, curious and committed person.
ABOUT.DESC5: I am currently programming, researching and investigating the whole Angular ecosystem, besides this is in my goals to learn cloud technologies.
ABOUT.CONTACT: If you want to program something or have a chat, feel free to contact me.

INFOAPP.TITLE: Angular Portfolio
INFOAPP.DESC: SPA made with Angular14, TailwindCSS and TypeScript, RxJS, Material, SweetAlert, aos, ng-arrangement, etc.
